column5: Just checking if anyone has stayed at Evergreen Lodge on LacSeul. We have stayed at Manitou Falls Camp for many years, but the may have just stayed there for the last time. Am interested in any suggestions, and or places to check into. Thanks, Trucky1959
In three weeks I will begin my 3rd year there. Top notch camp.Email if you want specifics [email protected]

We've stayed at Evergreen Lodge for the last 8 years. The camp owners are great and the camp is one of the best on the lake. You will enjoy your stay and will have great fishing. They also provide the best boats on the lake. A 29" walleye was caught and released just yesterday. Once your spoiled at Evergreen you'll never want to stay anywhere else. Enjoy your trip.
I've been going there for 18 years now. You won't regret getting in there, if you can. Real nice boats and motors, good facilities, great people. I hate to come home after staying there.
